source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA AS SchemaName,
       TABLE_NAME AS TableName
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'techsub'
AND TABLE_NAME IN ('appariel', 'arret', 'categoriearret', 'categorieprestation','equipement',
                   'chantier', 'client', 'collaborateur', 'compteanalytique',
                   'detailbudget', 'diametre', 'fonction', 'pays', 'horaireposte',
                   'prestation', 'site', 'sondage', 'soustraitant', 'typearret',
                   'typeprestation', 'zoneaffectaion', 'rapportbudgetmachine','rapportjournalier');
